query: SELECT COLUMN_NAME, DATA_TYPE FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'users' AND TABLE_SCHEMA = DATABASE();
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 7DorTNURquHZQZu.root --database WQoqrgvAJmZqDJX9hYJoWw --execute SELECT COLUMN_NAME, DATA_TYPE FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'users' AND TABLE_SCHEMA = DATABASE();
stdout:
COLUMN_NAME	DATA_TYPE
id	int
openId	varchar
name	text
email	varchar
loginMethod	varchar
role	enum
createdAt	timestamp
updatedAt	timestamp
lastSignedIn	timestamp
